cab.content: SECRET.OPERATIONS,Prom : - General Delme Radcliffe, Italy, To C.I.G.S., War Office.Despatched 10.42 a.m. 29/12/17.Received 12.5 p.m. 29/12/17.10078, December 28th. Evening situation. Nothing to report of importance on 3rd Army front. -4th Army; Slight enemy shelling by heavy artillery in Asozone area and M.T,Costa,1st Army, About 11 p.:a. after short artillery preparation Italians surprised enemy at Cima Tre Pezz capturing 25 prisoners including one officer and seizing rifles and various material.3rd Corps. Nothing to report of importance.Snov; has fallen in the mountains to an average depth, of 15 centimetres .
